What you will need.. • Toys • Food bowl • Food • Comfy bed • Brush • Tooth brush • Lead • And bags for on a walk

Training

•Tell the dog to sit if he /she sits then give them a treat

•Tell the dog to roll over move your hands slowly and if the dog rolls over then give a treat

•When on walk tell then dog to heel if the dog does not come to heel then pull the lead a little bit

Remember to play with your dog lots and make them feel comfy
